title: President's List
description: Recognized by the University of North Alabama and the Sanders College of Business and Technology for exceptional academic achievement.

title: Dean's List

title: Personal Recognition
description: College senior at UNA majoring in IT with a Cybersecurity concentration, former Scout Team President with volunteer experience (Red Crescent & UNICEF), and maintaining a strong academic performance (GPA 3.60 expected at graduation).
